refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gephex is the main executable of the interactive video effect system gephex. It starts both gephex-engine 1 and gephex-gui 1 .

There are no command line parameters. All parameters are set in the config file. The GEPHEX_XTERM environment variable is used to choose an x terminal emulator in which the engine is started. The GEPHEX_XTERM_FLAGS variable can be used to pass extra flags to this terminal emulator.

The projects main intent is to create a framework that allows video-jockeys to design complex real-time video effects. The user can influence parameters and data flow with interactive controls like joysticks or midi devices.
